content: MT-C-GLP X A OC Connector plate Hot-dip galvanized connector plate for cantilever connections with MT-80 MT-100 girders in moderately corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Increased load resistance for cantilevered girders Adjustable – elongated holes allow 5 mm (1/4) adjustability Compatible with MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Right-angle connections between MT-80 girders (including cantilevers) Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2332783 - Connector MT-C-GLP X A OC - Package Size 10 pc
